long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OCOI is a social media platform that is always one click away!

OCOI lets you to start or join a discussion about the website you are viewing. 

* Discuss a live event in real-time
* Share your opinion on the new episode of your favorite series
* Check previous messages to find out people's opinions on a website
* Become an OCOI guide with popular messages

Just open a website and open OCOI to start chatting! OCOI automatically detects the website and opens it's conversation.
